featuredArticle.title: Thunder sign Alex Caruso to reported 4-year, $81 million extension
featuredArticle.description: A two-time All-Defensive Team member, Caruso is now locked up with Oklahoma City through the 2028-29 season.

featuredArticle.title: Caruso holds The Alex Caruso Foundation’s inaugural charity golf tournament
featuredArticle.description: BRYAN, Texas (KBTX) - Former Texas A&M men’s basketball star Alex Caruso held his inaugural Alex Caruso Foundation charity golf tournament at Miramont Country Club.

featuredArticle.title: Thunder trade Josh Giddey to Bulls in exchange for Alex Caruso
featuredArticle.description: Oklahoma City adds one of the NBA's best on-ball defenders, while Chicago acquires a playmaker with untapped potential.

featuredArticle.title: Bulls' Alex Caruso wins 2023-24 NBA Hustle Award
featuredArticle.description: The Bulls' defensive-minded guard wins the honor for the first time in the award’s 8-year history.

allArticles.title: Urban League with Williams and Caruso
allArticles.description: Thunder players Jalen Williams and Alex Caruso made a surprise appearance at Urban League of Oklahoma to participate in STEM programs and activities with the students.

allArticles.title: Thunder win 13 straight, cruising past Clippers
allArticles.description: Once again, the Oklahoma City Thunder (28-5) took over a once-competitive game with a suffocating run, this time doing the third quarter thing to finish flipping a first-half 16-point deficit to an 18-point 'in the bag' with a 42-20 frame.

allArticles.title: Thunder sign Alex Caruso to reported 4-year, $81 million extension

allArticles.title: LeBron James comments on Alex Caruso's ability amid $81 million extension
Alex Caruso reacts to contract extension, excited for long-term future with Thunder
allArticles.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder gifted their fans an early Christmas present. A little over a day after he became eligible, Alex Caruso was signed to a four-year, $81 million extension.

allArticles.title: Stiles Points: Alex Caruso Finding Groove With OKC Thunder
allArticles.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder have tasked Alex Caruso with being a key piece off the bench who is also asked to close games. The Thunder, saw the newly acquired player struggle out of the gate before coming onto the scene.

allArticles.title: Alex Caruso hopes to sign extension to remain in Oklahoma City
allArticles.description: Alex Caruso is a hand-in-glove fit with the Oklahoma City Thunder, an elite wing defender who is a threat from 3 and can do some secondary ball handling. Coach Mark Daigneault can bring him off the Thunder bench and they do not lose a step.

allArticles.title: Starting 5, Dec. 15: Bucks, Thunder set for Emirates NBA Cup title showdown in Las Vegas
allArticles.description: SGA and the Thunder will face Giannis and the Bucks in Tuesday's Emirates NBA Cup championship (8:30 ET, ABC).
